QuestData.Title: Stalking the Warrens
QuestData.Description:
So, they are creating magical beasts deep within the Warrens. Their power is... substantial.
Maw Walker, I must trust in you to handle this. While I can provide insight, in combat I must admit your prowess exceeds my own.
Hunt the beasts that they train to hunt us. Show the Mawsworn that we too can bare fangs.
QuestData.LogDescription:
Complete a Hunt in The Beastwarrens.
Suggested Players [5]
QuestData.RewardText: I suspect this will not be your last foray into the Warrens.
